text: Allahâ€Œra'i ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu ache prthibite. Ara tomadera antare ya ache ta prakasa karo, ba ta lukiye rakho, allah tara jan'ya tomadera hiseba-nikesa nebena. Kaje'i yake tini iccha karabena paritrana karabena ebam yake iccha karabena sasti'o debena. Ara allah saba-kichura upare sarbasaktimana.
